componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: 📣 ATTENTION: We do not manage approvals in Salesforce for Custom Creative-Only campaigns; we only manage the approvals seen in the Approval Type field below. If your campaign involves any sort of Custom Creative please add a check mark to the field called "Custom Creative Oppty"

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: Custom Creative (Only if combined with Expedite and/or Exception)

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: ✋ ATTENTION: The related Account is missing Billing Country or Shipping Country. Navigate to the account listed under "Account Name" and update the country fields.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: ✋ ATTENTION: This opportunity is missing a Price Book. Products can't be added if the Price Book is not "Advertising".

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
📌 The Approval tab will show you if your opportunity was submitted for approval in the Approval History related list. If this opportunity was not approved and it is in Submitted status then given opportunity is locked from edits. The Submitter must recall the approval or the oppty must be approved to edit it.


📌 Is there an existing open opportunity that needs to be deleted? We do not delete opportunities but we instead Discard them to remove them from pipeline. How to discard? Fill the Discard Reason field below and change the stage to Closed, click on Mark Stage as Complete and select "Discard" from the list of options.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: 📌 Custom Creative is required in this campaign

componentInstanceProperties.name: titleFieldName
componentInstanceProperties.value: Is Custom Creative required in this campaign?
